service.info_ru: Eto avtootvetchik, kotoryj prinimaet i sohranjaet golosovye soobshhenija, esli Vash mobilnyj telefon vykljuchen, ili Vy ne mozhete otvetit na zvonok.
service.info_ua: Tse avtovіdpovіdach, scho pryjmae і zberіgae golosovі povіdomlennja, jakscho Vash mobіlnyj vymkneno, abo Vy ne mozhete vіdpovіsty na dzvіnok.
service.info_en: It is a usual answering machine allows you to accept and save voice messages in case your phone is switched off or you cannot answer a call.
service.info_active_ru: Usluga Golosovaja pochta aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 522*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 523.
service.info_active_ua: Posluga Golosova poshta actyvna. Dlja deaktyvatsii vidpravte 522*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 523.
service.info_active_en: Voice Mail service is active. To deactivate it, send 522*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 523.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii otpravte 521*<1/2>*Parol dlja IVR. 1 - russkij jazyk, 2 - anglijskij. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 523.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga neaktyvna. Dlja aktyvatsii vidpravte 521*<1/2>*Parol dlja IVR. 1- rosijska mova, 2 - angliska. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 523.
service.info_not_active_en: Voice Mail service is not active. To activate send 521*<1/2>*Password for IVR. 1-rus, 2-eng. To get info about service send 523.
service.info_success_activation_ru: Zajavka na aktivatsiju uslugi Golosovaja pochta prinjata.
service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy Golosova poshta pryjnjato.
service.info_success_activation_en: Order for activation of Voice Mail service is accepted.
service.info_success_deactivation_ru: Zajavka na deaktivatsiju uslugi Golosovaja pochta prinjata.
service.info_success_deactivation_ua: Zamovlennja na deaktyvatsiju poslugy Golosova poshta pryjnjato.
service.info_success_deactivation_en: Order for deactivation of Voice Mail service is accepted.

service.info_ru: Usluga, kotoraja pozvolit Vam otpravljat i poluchat na mobilnyj telefon korotkie tekstovye soobschenija.
service.info_ua: Posluga, jaka dozvolyt Vam vidpravljaty i otrymuvaty na mobilnyj telefon korotki tekstovi povidomlennja.
service.info_en: Service provides opportunity to send and to receive short text messages on your mobile.
service.info_active_ru: Usluga SMS aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 532*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 533.
service.info_active_ua: Posluga SMS aktyvna. Dlja deaktyvatsii vidpravte 532*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 533.
service.info_active_en: Service SMS is active. To deactivate it, send 532*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 533.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga SMS neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii otpravte 531*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 533.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga SMS neaktyvna. Dlja aktyvatsii vidpravte 531*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 533.
service.info_not_active_en: Service SMS is not active. To activate it, send 531*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 533.
service.info_success_activation_ru: Zajavka na aktivatsiju uslugi SMS prinjata.
service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy SMS pryjnjato.
service.info_success_activation_en: Order for activation of SMS service is accepted.
service.info_success_deactivation_ru: Zajavka na aktivatsiju uslugi SMS prinjata.
service.info_success_deactivation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy SMS pryjnjato.
service.info_success_deactivation_en: Order for deactivation of SMS service is accepted.

service.info_ru: Usluga, kotoraja pozvoljaet sovershat ishodjaschie zvonki s Vashego nomera za predely Ukrainy.
service.info_ua: Posluga, jaka dozvoljae zdijsnjuvaty vykhidni dzvinky z Vashogo nomeru za mezhi Ukrainy.
service.info_en: Service provides opportunity to make outgoing calls from your number abroad.
service.info_active_ru: Mezhdunarodnaja linija aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii obratites k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 503.
service.info_active_ua: Mizhnarodna linija aktyvna. Dlja deaktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 503.
service.info_active_en: Service International line is active. To deactivate it, address the operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 503.
service.info_not_active_ru: Mezhdunarodnaja linija neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii obratites k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 503.
service.info_not_active_ua: Mizhnarodna linija neaktyvna. Dlja aktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 503.
service.info_not_active_en: Service International line is not active. To activate it, address the operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 503.

service.info_ru: Usluga kotoraja pozvoljaet polzovatsja Vashym nomerom za predelami Ukrainy.
service.info_ua: Posluga, jaka dozvoljae korystuvatysja Vashym nomerom za mezhamy Ukrainy.
service.info_en: Service provides opportunity to use your number aboard.
service.info_active_ru: Mezhdunarodnyj rouming aktiven. Dlja deaktivatsii obratites k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 513.
service.info_active_ua: Mizhnarodnyj rouming aktyvnij. Dlja deaktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 513.
service.info_active_en: Service International roaming is active. To deactivate it, address the operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 513.
service.info_not_active_ru: Mezhdunarodnyj rouming neaktiven. Dlja deaktivatsii obratites k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 513.
service.info_not_active_ua: Mizhnarodnyj rouming neaktyvnij. Dlja deaktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 513.
service.info_not_active_en: Service International roaming is not active. To activate it, address the operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 513.

service.info_ru: Usluga zapreschaet pokaz Vashego nomera na displee telefona abonenta, kotoromu Vy zvonite.Oplata odnorazovaja pri aktivatsii, sostavljaet 163,50 grn.
service.info_ua: Posluga zaboronjae pokaz Vashogo nomera na dysplei telefonu abonenta, jakomu Vy telefonuete. Oplata za aktyvatsiju poslugy odnorazovo, skladae 163,50 hrn.
service.info_en: Service allows you to restrict the display of your phone number on the phone you are calling. The payment for activation of service - once, 163,50 hrn.
service.info_active_ru: Usluga Zapret na opredelenie nomera aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 612*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 613.
service.info_active_ua: Posluga Zaborona vyznachennja nomera aktyvna. Dlja deaktyvatsii vidpravte 612*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 613.
service.info_active_en: Service Calling line identity restriction is active. To deactivate it, send 612*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 613.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga Zapret na opredelenie nomera neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii otpravte 612*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 613.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga Zaborona vyznachennja nomera neaktyvna. Dlja aktyvatsii vidpravte 611*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 613.
service.info_not_active_en: Service Calling line identity restriction is not active. To activate it, send 611*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 613.
service.info_success_activation_ru: Zajavka na aktivatsiju uslugi Zapret na opredelenie nomera prinjata.
service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy Zaborona vyznachennja nomera pryjnjato.
service.info_success_activation_en: Order for activation of Calling line identity restriction is accepted.
service.info_success_deactivation_ru: Zajavka na deaktivatsiju uslugi Zapret na opredelenie nomera prinjata.
service.info_success_deactivation_ua: Zamovlennja na deaktyvatsiju poslugy Zaborona vyznachennja nomera pryjnjato.
service.info_success_deactivation_en: Order for deactivation of Calling line identity restriction is accepted.

service.info_ru: Usluga, kotoraja pozvoljaet kontraktnym abonentam MTS zvonit so skidkoj na gorodskie nomera v predelah oblasti.
service.info_ua: Posluga, scho dozvoljae kontraktnym abonentam MTS telefonuvaty zі znizhkoju na mіskі nomery v mezhah oblastі.
service.info_en: Enables contract subscribers of MTS to make in-city calls within the limits of an oblast at a half price.
service.info_active_ru: Moja Oblast’ aktivna. Dlja deaktivacії otprav’te 412*Parol dlja ІVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 413.
service.info_active_ua: Moja Oblast’ aktivna. Dlja deaktivacії vіdpravte 412*Parol dlja ІVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 413.

service.info_not_active_ru: Moja Oblast’ neaktivna. Dlja aktivacії otprav’te 411*Parol dlja ІVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 413.

service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy Moja Oblast’ pryjnjato.
service.info_success_activation_en: Order for activation of My Region service is accepted.
service.info_success_deactivation_ru: Zajavka na deaktivatsiju uslugi Moja Oblast’ prinjata.
service.info_success_deactivation_ua: Zamovlennja na deaktyvatsiju poslugy Moja Oblast’ pryjnjato.
service.info_success_deactivation_en: Order for deactivation of My Region service is accepted.

service.info_ru: Usluga, kotoraja pozvoljaet zvonit po snizhennym tarifam na vybrannye nomera MTS, Jeans.
service.info_ua: Posluga, scho dozvoljae telefonuvaty za znyzhenym taryfom na obrani nomery MTS, JEANS.
service.info_en: Enables subscribers to make calls on chosen numbers MTS, Jeans at a half price.

service.info_active_ru: Vnesti ili izmenit' nomer v 1 jachejke otpravte 4051, 2 jachejke 4052, 3 jachejke 4053, 4 jachejke 4054, 5 jachejke 4055.

service.info_active_en: To enter or change in 1 cell send 4051, 2 cell 4052, 3 cell 4053, 4 cell 4054, 5 cell 4055.

service.info_active_ru: Zajavka na deaktivatsiju uslugi Moja Semja prinjata.

service.info_active_en: Order for deactivation of the My Family service is accepted.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga Moja Semja neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii otpravte 401, dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 403.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga Moja Simja neaktyvna. Dlja actyvatsii vidpravte 401, dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu 403.
service.info_not_active_en: Service My Family is not active. For activation send 401, to get info about service send 403.

service.info_ru: Dostup v internet s Vashego mobil'nogo telefona s pomoshh'ju tehnologii GPRS
service.info_ua: Dostup do internetu z Vashogo mobіl'nogo telefonu za dopomogoju tehnologії GPRS
service.info_en: Direct access to internet resources from your mobile phone - via GPRS technologies
service.info_active_ru: GPRS uslugi aktivny. Dlja deaktivaciji otprav'te 302*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 303
service.info_active_ua: GPRS poslugy aktyvovani. Dlja deaktivacii vidpravte 302*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vidpravte 303
service.info_active_en: GPRS-services are active. To deactivate send 302*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 303а
service.info_not_active_ru: GPRS uslugi neaktivny. Dlja aktivaciji otprav'te 301*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 303
service.info_not_active_ua: GPRS poslugy neaktivni. Dlja aktivacii vidpravte 301*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vidpravte 303

service.info_ru: Usluga kotoraja pozvoljaet peredavat I prinimat dannye ili faksy.
service.info_ua: Posluga, jaka dozvoljae peredavaty ta prujmaty danni chy faksy.
service.info_en: Service provides opportunity to transfer data and faxes.
service.info_active_ru: Usluga Peredacha dannykh aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii obratites k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 313.
service.info_active_ua: Posluga Peredacha danykh aktyvna. Dlja deaktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 333.
service.info_active_en: Service Data transfer is active. To deactivate it, address your operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 313.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga Peredacha dannykh neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii obratites k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 313.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga Peredacha danykh neaktyvna. Dlja aktyvatsii zvernisja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 333.
service.info_not_active_en: Service Data transfer is not active. To activate it, address your operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 313.

service.info_success_activation_en: Your offer to activate Package is received.
Your offer to activate Package is received.
Your offer to activate Package is received.
Your offer to activate Package is received.

service.info_ru: Vam dostupno mnozhestvo dopolnitelnyh uslug: pereadresatsija, ozhidanie zvonka, konferents-svjaz, zapret vhodjaschih i ishodjaschih zvonkov.
service.info_ua: Vam dostupny bezlіch dodatkovyh poslug: pereadresatsіja, ochikuvannja dzvіnka, konferents-zvjazok, zaborona vhіdnyh ta vyhіdnyh dzvіnkіv.
service.info_en: Enjoy multiple complementary services: call forwarding, call waiting, conference calling, prohibition of incoming and outgoing calls.
service.info_active_ru: Usluga Dopolnitelnyj paket seti aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 602*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 603.
service.info_active_ua: Posluga Dodatkovyj paket merezhi aktyvna. Dlja deaktyvatsii vidpravte 602*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 603.
service.info_active_en: Service Additional network package is active. To deactivate it, send 602*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 603.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga Dopolnitelnyj paket seti neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii otpravte 601*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 603.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga Dodatkovyj paket merezhi neaktyvna. Dlja aktyvatsii vidpravte 601*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 603.
service.info_not_active_en: Service Additional network package is not active. To activate it, send 601*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 603.

service.info_success_deactivation_ua: Zamovlennja na deaktyvatsiju poslugy Dodatkovyj paket merezhi pryjnjato.
service.info_success_deactivation_en: Order for deactivation of Service Additional network package is accepted.

service.info_ru: Usluga, kotoraja pozvolit Vam poluchat detalnuju informatsiju po vsem uslugam, kotorye ispolzovalis Vami na protjazhenii mesjatsa.
service.info_ua: Posluga, jaka dozvolyt Vam otrymuvaty detalnu informatsiju po vsim poslugam, jaki vykorystovuvalys Vamy na protjazi misjatsja.
service.info_en: Service provides opportunity to receive detailed information according all the services which were used by you within the month.
service.info_active_ru: Usluga Detalnyj schet aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii obraschajtes k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 623.
service.info_active_ua: Detalnyj rakhunok aktyvnyj. Dlja deaktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 623.
service.info_active_en: Service Detailed bill is active. To deactivate it, address the operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 623.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga Detalnyj schet neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii obraschajtes k operatoru po besplatnomu nomeru 111. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 623.
service.info_not_active_ua: Detalnyj rakhunok neaktyvnyj. Dlja aktyvatsii zvernitsja do operatora za bezkoshtovnym nomerom 111. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 623.
service.info_not_active_en: Service Detailed bill service is not active. To activate it, address the operator by the free number 111. To get info about service send 623.

service.info_ua: Vnesti chi zminiti nomer u 1 komirci vidpravte 4051, 2 komirci 4052, 3 komirci 4053, 4 komirci 4054, 5 komirci 4055
service.info_en: To enter or change in 1 cell send 4051, 2 cell 4052, 3 cell 4053, 4 cell 4054, 5 cell 4055.
service.info_not_active_ru: Usluga Moja Semja neaktivna. Dlja aktivatsii otpravte 401, dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 403.
service.info_not_active_ua: Posluga Moja Simja neaktyvna. Dlja actyvatsii vidpravte 401, dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu 403.
service.info_not_active_en: Service My Family is not active. For activation send 401, to get info about service send 403.

service.info_active_ru: Usluga Moja Simja 1 nomer aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 402*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 403.
service.info_active_ua: Posluga Moja Simja 1 nomer actyvna. Dlja deactyvatsii vidpravte 402*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja otrymannja informaciji pro poslugu vіdpravte 403.
service.info_active_en: Service My Family 1 number is active. To deactivate it, send 402*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 403.
service.info_success_activation_ru: Zajavka na aktivatsiju uslugi Moja Simja 1 nomer prinjata.
service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy Moja Simja 1 nomer pryjnjato.
service.info_success_activation_en: Order for activation of the My Family 1 number service is accepted.

service.info_active_ru: Usluga Moja Simja 2 nomer aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 402*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 403.

service.info_active_en: Service My Family 2 number is active. To deactivate it, send 402*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 403.
service.info_success_activation_ru: Zajavka na aktivatsiju uslugi Moja Simja 2 nomer prinjata.
service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy Moja Simja 2 nomer pryjnjato.
service.info_success_activation_en: Order for activation of the My Family 2 number service is accepted.

service.info_active_ru: Usluga Moja Simja 3 nomer aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 402*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 403.

service.info_active_en: Service My Family 3 number is active. To deactivate it, send 402*Password for IVR. To get info about service send 403.

service.info_success_activation_ua: Zamovlennja na aktyvatsiju poslugy Moja Simja 3 nomer pryjnjato.

service.info_active_ru: Usluga Moja Simja 5 nomer aktivna. Dlja deaktivatsii otpravte 402*Parol dlja IVR. Dlja poluchenija informaciji pro uslugu otpravte 403.
